meanings.sent1: In school, we learn about biologies and how animals survive.
meanings.sent2: Scientists dedicate their lives to the study of biologies.
meanings.sent3: The book on biologies was so interesting, it kept me up all night!
meanings.sent4: Exploring the biologies of nature is like unraveling a mystery.
meanings.sent5: Her passion for biologies was evident in every conversation she had.

meanings.definition: The characteristics and behaviors of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper observed the biologies of the monkeys closely.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the biologies of different species helps in conservation efforts.
meanings.sent3: The biologies of the mischievous raccoon always made the campers laugh.
meanings.sent4: The biologies of the lioness reflected strength and grace.
meanings.sent5: The biologies of the birds in flight fascinated the young biologist.

meanings.definition: The biological processes and functions of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Doctors study the biologies of the human body to treat illnesses.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the biologies of plants helps in gardening.
meanings.sent3: The biologies of digestion can sometimes be a topic of dinner conversation.
meanings.sent4: The biologies of photosynthesis in plants are like a magical energy dance.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the biologies of the ocean creatures was like diving into a new world.
